form.text: Why are we advertising? What do we plan to achieve?
form.label: header

form.text: To whom are we talking? Who is the primary target? Is there a secondary target? What is their relationship to the brand what do they currently think about it?
form.label: question

form.text: What is the single most important message/idea we are trying to communicate? What is the unique selling position that will help us achieve our advertising goal? Are there any secondary messages?
form.label: question

form.text: What is the key benefit to the target? What's in it for the reader?
form.label: question

form.text: Is there an offer/call to action? What are we offering the target to persuade him/her to act now? (A premium, sweepstakes, limited-time offer, free information, or something else?
form.label: question

form.text: What would we like our target to think? What would our target say after being exposed to our program?
form.label: question
